str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.
Decision; by extension, a tribunal; by implication, justice.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Present participle of archo; a first.
Probably from the base of komizo; orderly arrangement, i.e. Decoration; by implication, the world (morally).

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Properly, to distinguish, i.e. Decide; by implication, to try, condemn, punish.
